A fully customizable portfolio template designed to help you showcase your work and market yourself effectively.

### Why Choose This Template?

- ⏱️ Save 100+ hours of work
- 🫰 Easy to configure and change
- 🎨 Beautiful design
- 🌐 Optimized for search engines
- 📱 Responsive design
- 📦 1-click download and setup
- 📝 5 minutes to update the text and images
- 🚀 Deploy live to vercel

### Features Included

- **Hero Section**: Make a memorable first impression.
- **About Section**: Share your story and professional background.
- **Work Section**: Highlight your experience and career milestones.
- **Education Section**: Showcase your academic journey.
- **Projects Section**: Display your best work with pride.
- **Hackathon Section**: Feature your achievements and participation.
- **Contact Section**: Make it easy for others to get in touch.
- **Blog Section**: Share insights, experiences, and updates.
